name: InterGalactic Wars
description:
TWO PLAYER GAME !

HOW TO ENTER MY NAME?

On opening the game you can enter your name in the textbox for each of the player.

Press Confirm to confirm the name,and your name will be shown.

press F5 on home screen to know author

press Escape to exit

HOW TO PLAY?

Press the play game button to play the game.

For the left player, use w,a,s and d buttons to move and left_control to shoot.

For the right player, use up,down,left and right arrow buttons to move and right_control to shoot.
